message.content: We want to check whether the number 13 is prime. During the algorithm execution, the matrix will contain in the second row the rest of the divisions by the the corresponding numbers in the first row.
The first number to be tried as a factor is 2 (in yellow).
The yellow number is not a factor of 13 , since the rest of the division is the green number.
The new number to be tried as a factor is in yellow and the white numbers (if any) have been already considered as possible factors.

The new number to be tried as a factor is in yellow and the white numbers (if any) have been already considered as possible factors.
The yellow number is not a factor of 13 , since the rest of the division is the green number.
The loop searching for a factor of 13 ended and the last examined number is the rightmost white one in the first row.
The number 13 is prime.
